line_1: The fierce Croatian, and the wild Hussar,
line_2: And all the sons of ravage crowd the war;

line_1: By the light of the moon, her poor wounded Hussar!
line_2: All mournful she hasten'd, nor wander'd she far,

line_1: To cheer the lone heart of your wounded Hussar?
line_2: How bitter she wept o'er the victim of war?

line_1: When he sunk in her arms — the poor wounded Hussar?
line_2: Ye babes of my love that await me afar!
